articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Air and Anti-Air Force Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Air and Anti-Air Force Unit
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected KPA Air and Anti-Air Force Unit 991 honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment.
					 He went round the monument to the field guidance provided by leader Kim Jong Il on March 2, 2006 erected to convey his leadership exploits to posterity, looking back on the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in developing the Juche-oriented air force.
					
					 Thanks to their matchless and distinguished ability to command the army and meticulous care the Juche-based air force could fly in the vast sky with loyalty to safeguard the party and revolution only and glorify the proud history of its development as a matchless service of the army strong in idea and morality, he said.
					
					 Noting that the Juche-oriented air force is the precious revolutionary legacy left by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he stressed that the feats performed by them in building the Juche-oriented air force will shine forever.
					
					 He learned about the situation of the unit from its commander and praised it for having made flight drills a part of everyday life as intended by the party, exerted sustained efforts to study and round off the Juche-based methods of air battle, trained pilots to be death-defying corps in the sky and able combat airmen capable of successfully performing any combat duty of modern warfare and put aircraft, weapons and combat and technical equipment on regular alert.
					
					  After asking commanding officers about the supply service in the unit and airmen's living conditions in detail, he underlined the need to pay deep attention to the supply service and their living conditions as the unit is stationed in the far-flung northern end and settle the problems in good time on a priority basis. 
					
					 Going round the lecture room of the squadron and general lecture room for piloting drill, he acquainted himself in detail with the airmen's study and flight training.
					
					 "If airmen are to be ready to satisfactorily perform their combat missions under any unfavorable circumstances and conditions any time, it is good to let them undergo a lot of training with the help of piloting training equipment", he said, underlining the need for all of them to study hard methods of taking off and landing on strange airfields and air attack zones and terrain of anti-air defence and acquire well flight methods in bad weather and get fully trained through steady training with the help of seats and apparatuses.
					
					 He had a photo session with the airmen of the unit, expressing the expectation and belief that they would continue to decorate the blue sky of the country with heroic feats in the future, too, by carrying forward the shining tradition of the proud unit which produced many airmen of distinguished services including heroes of the Republic under the energetic leadership and warm loving care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA Air Force General Ri Pyong Chol, commander of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force, Army Col. General So Hong Chan, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and Army Col. General Pak Jong Chon, vice-chief of the KPA General Staff and director of its Fire Command Department.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates to Romanian President-elect
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates to Romanian President-elect
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPR of Korea, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Romanian president-elect Klaus Iohannis. 
					 The message wished him success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country and welfare of its people.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets Lebanese PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets Lebanese PM
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a message of greeting to Tammam Salam, prime minister of Lebanon, on Friday on the occasion of the 71st anniversary of its independence day.
					 The message wished the prime minister and his government greater success in their work for the stability and development of the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to Minister of Foreign Affairs and Immigrants of Lebanon Gebran Bassil on the same day.

articles.title: KPA Southwestern Front Command Issues Warning to S. Korean Military
articles.content:
KPA Southwestern Front Command Issues Warning to S. Korean Military
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The southwestern front command of the Korean People's Army (KPA) released a report Friday as regards the fact that the south Korean puppet military warmongers are getting evermore pronounced in confrontation and provocation moves against the DPRK though four years have passed after the Yonphyong Island shelling incident.
					 The south Korean puppet military warmongers are mulling concluding the Hoguk joint military exercises with madcap live-shelling drills on Paekryong and Yonphyong islands with the backing of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces present in south Korea.
					
					 They are planning to hold even a military parade as well as "memorial service", "awarding ceremony", "floral visit", etc. for those provokers who met a miserable end on the occasion of Nov. 23, the day of the Yonphyong Island shelling incident.
					
					 The world knows no one but the puppet military warmongers who go so brazen as to hold even such "ceremony" by painting the defeat as "victory", the report said, and went on:
					
					 The KPA officers and men on the southwestern front sharply watch with high vigilance the warmongers keen only on driving the situation to an extreme phase through provocations in the acute hotspot waters, still without discretion.
					
					 Ridiculous is such behavior of those defeated provokers, who ardently asked the KPA to stop shelling at that time when the island was turned into a "hell of death" and "everything there was being reduced into ashes" by its shower of fire for justice. 
					
					 It is the retaliatory will of the stalwart fighters on the southwestern front greeting the fourth anniversary of their victory in the Yonphyong Island shelling to bury the provokers at the bottom of sea for good so that they may not say even about "retrieval of defeat". 
					
					 The mad provokers are bound to be beaten or killed by the KPA. It is their inevitable and miserable fate.
					
					 The sound of gunfire by the KPA in the Yonphyong Island shelling will remain an echo of victory forever, but it will always remain a dirge of defeat for the provokers.
					
					 The south Korean military warmongers should never forget the lesson from the bitter defeat in the Yonphyong Island shelling all the time, the report warned.

articles.title: CPRK Raps S. Korean Authorities' Politically Motivated Provocation
articles.content:
CPRK Raps S. Korean Authorities' Politically Motivated Provocation
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) on Friday released a statement assailing the south Korean puppet group for pushing its campaign of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK to an extreme pitch.
					 Betes noires of the puppet ultra-right conservative organizations including the Phohang branch of the "Association of Those with Special Mission" held a rally for inciting the confrontation with the DPRK at the plaza before the Phohang City Office in North Kyongsang Province on Thursday afternoon on the 4th anniversary of the Yonphyong Island shelling incident and staged a farce of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 This farce timed to coincide with the largest-ever combined landing drill in Phohang for a sudden attack on the north was a carefully-worked-out deliberate politically motivated provocation of the south Korean authorities from A to Z, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the Park Geun Hye group is talking volumes about "confidence", "dialogue" and "peace" but is dreaming of achieving its ambition for "unification of the social systems" with the sinister intention to escalate the confrontation.
					
					 The DPRK has declared more than once that it would never pardon any act of hurting the dignity of its supreme leadership but mercilessly punish it.
					
					 Under the situation where the puppet group openly revealed its real intention not to rule out even a war by malignantly hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, the life and soul of the Korean people, the DPRK will more significantly bolster up the striking power corresponding to it and mercilessly punish the provokers by unimaginable means and methods.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces will be held wholly responsible for all catastrophic consequences to be entailed in the north-south relations in the future.

articles.title: Exhibition of Sports Scientific and Technological Successes Closes
articles.content:
DPRK Judokas Prove Successful in Judo Grand Prix, Qingdao 2014
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The 18th national exhibition of sports scientific and technological successes closed with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Friday.
					 The exhibition offered a good occasion of swapping the successes and experience gained in the course of putting the sports on a scientific basis and introducing valuable sci-tech achievements into practice.
					
					  Korea University of Physical Education came first in sports software, Sosong District Juvenile Sports School in Pyongyang in sports measuring instruments, the Pyongyang Apparatus Factory in athletic equipment, the Kwanmobong Sport Team in sports medicine and the Chilbosan Sports Team in sports nutrition in overall standing.

articles.title: Child Health Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Child Health Day Marked in DPRK 
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- An event took place at Okryu Children's Hospital Friday to mark the Child Health Day. 
					 Present at the event were Kim Hyong Hun, vice-minister of Public Health who is chairman of the Korean Association for Supporting the Children, members of the association, officials of scientific and public health fields, Stephan Paul Jost, representative of the WHO in the DPRK, and representatives of other international organizations and staff members of their missions and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 A speech was followed by the international seminar on child health and meeting for swapping experience. 
					
					 Speakers explained in detail the issues arising in the work for child health including child-protecting system in the DPRK, successes and experience gained in protecting babies health and nursing, problems to be solved by the Korean Association for Supporting the Children and its long-term plan. 
					
					 They said that the DPRK government considered it as an important one related to the future destiny of the revolution to bring up well the children, the future of the country, and has paid deep attention to the work. 
					
					 The participants looked round photos showing health service and child health protection in the DPRK, successes made in implementing the preventive medicine policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and cooperation with missions of international organizations here. 
					
					 A performance was given by children of baby homes and kindergartens at the event.

articles.title: DPRK Judokas Prove Successful in Judo Grand Prix, Qingdao 2014
articles.content:
DPRK Judokas Prove Successful in Judo Grand Prix, Qingdao 2014
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Judoka Hong Kuk Hyon came first in the Judo Grand Prix, Qingdao 2014 started in Qingdao, China on Nov. 19.
					 It brought together at least 200 men and women ace judokas from more than 30 countries and regions including the DPRK.
					
					 Hong Kuk Hyon beat his Mongolian and Chinese rivals in the preliminaries of the men's 73 kg category event and his Hungarian rival in the semi-finals with ippon.
					
					 He beat his Belgian rival in the finals, grabbing a gold medal.
					
					 Meanwhile, Kim Sol Mi won a bronze medal in the women's 48 kg category event.

articles.title: April 25 Sports Team Proves Successful in DPRK Championships
articles.content:
April 25 Sports Team Proves Successful in DPRK Championships
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The April 25 Sports Team of the DPRK topped the team standings in the 2014 DPRK Championships by taking 111 gold medals.
					 In the championships, nearly 5,000 players from more than 80 teams had competed for over 500 gold medals.
					
					 Male and female players of the April 25 Sports Team finished first in basketball and volleyball.
					
					 Especially, its players won 23 gold medals out of 45 in weightlifting while setting six new records in women's weightlifting and swimming events.
					
					  Ro Un Ok, female marathoner of the team, retained four-time championship and other players won the titles in table-tennis, track-and-field, wrestling, boxing and other events.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Sports Team of the Ministry of Land and Marine Transport bagged 59 gold medals and Kigwancha Sports Team 47 golds in the championships.

articles.title: Oxygen-Pulverized Coal Combustion Process Established
articles.content:
Oxygen-Pulverized Coal Combustion Process Established
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Researchers of the Heat Engineering Institute under the DPRK State Academy of Sciences have recently developed a new method of firing large boilers based on oxygen-enriched air blast.
					 The method has been proved economic as it fully secures the firing and combustion by burning pulverized anthracite with oxygen-enriched air while using no fuel oil.
					
					 Depending on this method, the researchers established the oxygen-pulverized coal combustion process and applied it to the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex.
					
					 The new technology is also highly appreciated by thermal power stations as it makes it possible to keep the electric-power production on a normal basis.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges Removal of Source of War on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges Removal of Source of War on Korean Peninsula 
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- It is the unshakable will of the DPRK army and people to root out the source of war on the Korean Peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Friday.
					 The source of war on the peninsula is just the anti-DPRK maneuvers of the U.S. and its puppet south Korean warmongers, the daily points out, adding:
					
					 The south Korean group of traitors gets hell-bent on the confrontation with fellow countrymen, stirring up the war fever, at a time when all Koreans hope for earlier reconciliation, unity, reunification, peace and prosperity of the nation through improving the north-south relations. If such reckless moves are overlooked, it will be a sin against the history and generations to come.
					
					 A retaliatory war of justice should be launched to remove the group of traitors frantically bringing the dark clouds of nuclear war. This is the only way to ensure durable peace in the Korean Peninsula and realize the long-cherished desire for its reunification.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should turn out in a nationwide patriotic war to mercilessly wipe out the south Korean puppet group, a hex of the nation and source of war.
					
					 The south Korean puppet warmongers should halt their reckless military provocations on all fronts at once, pondering over the dangerous consequences to be entailed by their saber rattling.
					
					 If they truly want the improved north-south relations, they should do things helpful to national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 Frequent war gambles like Hoguk exercises in south Korea bring nothing good to the improvement of north-south relations and national reconciliation and unity but will escalate confrontation among fellow countrymen and invite a nuclear war.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Deceptive Nature of Obama's Initiative
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Deceptive Nature of Obama's Initiative
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. reportedly decided to invest 30 billion U.S. dollars in remolding nuclear weapons control system in the years ahead. U.S. Secretary of Defense Chuck Hagel in a recent press conference at the Defense Department building said they would invest 10 billion U.S. dollars within five years in improving the nuclear weapons operational system, noting the system is old and has several drawbacks in management. This is the open declaration of the U.S. intention to continuously consider nukes as a main means for realizing its ambition for world domination, and a blatant challenge to the aspiration of mankind. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in an article. 
					
					 Noting that Obama's idea of building "a world without nuclear weapons" is nothing but honeyed words to deceive the world, the article goes on:
					
					 The idea much touted by the U.S. is no more than a folding screen to cover up its ambition for dominating the world by dint of a nuclear edge. In other words, the U.S. rushes headlong into the road quite opposite to nuclear disarmament to become the only dominator of the world. 
					
					 What is ridiculous is that the U.S. took issue with the DPRK while pushing forward the modernization of its nuclear weapons. The U.S. military heavyweights said that nuclear weapons modernization would be of "big help" to deterring the nukes of North Korea. 
					
					 The reckless remarks revealing the true colors of a top class liar go to prove once again how just the DPRK was when it decided to bolster up its nuclear deterrence. 
					
					 All facts clearly prove the justness of the DPRK government's stance that there can never be the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula before the denuclearization of the world.

articles.title: Solidarity Action for Winning Vital Rights Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Solidarity Action for Winning Vital Rights Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The Trade Union of the Hyundai Heavy Industry Co. Ltd. and the Hyundai Samho Heavy Industry Branch under the Metal Workers Trade Union of south Korea held a joint rally in Seoul on Nov. 19 demanding a wage hike and improvement of labor conditions.
					 The organizations recalled that the Trade Union of Hyundai Heavy Industry Co. Ltd. has negotiated with the company side since May in demand of the wage hike, the payment of wages to the full-time officials of the union and improvement of living conditions of the subcontracted workers.
					
					 They condemned the company side for refusing negotiations with the trade union and working hard to isolate it.
					
					 They declared their solidarity actions for the vital rights of the workers and their families.

articles.title: Settlement of Issue of Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Settlement of Issue of Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Citizens and students in Ulsan, south Korea held the 1 153rd Wednesday rally at Ulsan University on Nov. 19 demanding the settlement of the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 At the rally speakers recalled that many citizens and students in Ulsan held Wednesday rallies to denounce Japan for its hair-raising past crimes and force it to make an apology and reparation for them.
					
					 They urged Japan to admit the sexual slavery and make an apology and reparation for it as soon as possible.

articles.title: There Is No Peaceful Reunification without Independence: Koreans in US
articles.content:
There Is No Peaceful Reunification without Independence: Koreans in US
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. posted an article titled "There is no peaceful reunification without independence" on its website.
					 The south Korean puppet government has no sovereignty and such government is bound to act according to a decision of other country and follow it, the article said, adding that is why the army without sovereignty is called a puppet army.
					
					 The transfer of the right to wartime operation control (OPECON) expected in April, 2012 was extended by Lee Myung Bak by 2015 and it was extended by the Park Geun Hye regime for an indefinite period, it said, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are denying independence by using money. As army generals of south Korea have such spirit, sexual abuses and suicides are taking place in the military every day and the munitions industry is tainted with scandals of expropriations.
					
					 The striking difference between the north and the south is sovereignty. It is the north which protects sovereignty at any cost while the south persistently denies independence.
					
					 Sovereignty is the key to achieving the peaceful reunification of the country in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Australia held a memorial rally and demonstration in Brisbane, Australia on Nov. 15 demanding the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster and punishment of those responsible for it.
					 The south Korean authorities are turning their faces away from the pain of the bereaved families and obstructing a correct probe into the truth, they said.
					
					 The ferry Sewol disaster is a product of mammonism and scandals rampant in the south Korean society, they noted.
					
					 They urged the chief executive of south Korea to bear the responsibility for the failure to probe the truth till now, seven months since the ferry Sewol disaster.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Mongolian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Mongolian Paper
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was carried by the Mongolian paper Zuuny Medee on Nov. 13.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line and Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea are a mighty political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the arms and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly meet the requirements of the times and the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings and photo and book exhibitions took place in Finland, Poland and Myanmar from Nov. 13 to 15 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos documenting the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and photos and books introducing the achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that Kim Jong Il formulated the Juche idea as great Kimilsungism and developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an ever-victorious party guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, noted that the exhibition provided an opportunity to know better about the noble revolutionary career and undying feats of Kim Jong Il and deeply cherish boundless reverence for him.
					
					 Slaboy January Guzowski, chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, praised Kim Jong Il as the most distinguished leader who made great contributions to socialism, the human cause of independence and global peace and security for a long period.
					
					 A member of the Central Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar said that Kim Jong Il passed away but his immortal revolutionary life and exploits always remained in the hearts of the Korean people and the progressives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 991 de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 991 de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas de EPC
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la unidad 991 de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC, galardonada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					Viendo el monumento a la visita de orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien estuvo en la unidad el 2 de marzo de 2006, el Mariscal recordo las proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente acumuladas para el fortalecimiento y desarrollo de las autoctonas fuerzas aereas.
					
					Dijo que como resultado de la extraordinaria capacidad de mando militar y la minuciosa atencion de los lideres antecesores, las autoctonas fuerzas aereas pudieron navegar unicamente por la ruta de fidelidad en defensa del Partido y la revolucion y escribir una historia orgullosa de las fuerzas armadas sin rivales, preparadas con firmeza tanto en lo ideologico como en lo moral.
					
					Las autoctonas fuerzas aereas devienen un valioso patrimonio de la revolucion dejado por el Presidente y el Dirigente, apunto y continuo que brillaran de generacion en generacion las proezas de ellos realizadas en la construccion de la aviacion.
					
					Tras averiguar la situacion de la unidad recibiendo el parte del jefe de ella, el Mariscal elogio el hecho de que los uniformados de aqui realizan cotidianamente el entrenamiento de vuelo segun el proposito del partido, estudian y completan el autoctono metodo de combate aereo y se forman como pilotos capaces de cumplir con exito cualquier mision de combate aereo ultimando los preparativos de movilizacion de aviones, armas y los demas equipos tecnicos de combate.
					
					Se entero del estado de abastecimiento de la unidad y de las condiciones de vida de los pilotos preguntando los detalles a los comandantes de la unidad y destaco la necesidad de prestar profunda atencion a esas labores y de resolver a tiempo y con prioridad los problemas que surjan teniendo en cuenta que la unidad esta situada en la apartada zona septentrional.
					
					Recorriendo el aula de leccion del batallon de aviacion y el salon de leccion general de entrenamiento de pilotaje, el Comandante Supremo averiguo detalladamente como los aviadores estudian y se preparan para ejercicios de vuelo.
					
					Para formar a los pilotos capaces de cumplir con exito sus misiones de combate en cualquier tiempo, condiciones y situaciones desfavorables, hace falta ejercitar mucho con los aparatos de entrenamiento de pilotaje, instruyo.
					
					Prosiguio que todos los pilotos deben estudiar profundamente el proyecto de despegue y aterrizaje en los aeropuertos no acostumbrados y la topografia de las zonas de ataque aereo y las de defensa antiaerea, aprender bien los metodos de vuelo en las desfavorables condiciones climaticas y adiestrarlos perfectamente a traves del entrenamiento en asiento y los aparatos.
					
					El Mariscal se fotografio junto a los pilotos de la unidad expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que estos realizaran meritos heroicos en el cielo patrio continuando la orgullosa tradicion de su unidad de que salieron muchos ameritados como heroes de la Republica bajo la direccion energica y atencion benevola del Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					En esta ocasion el Mariscal fue acompanado por el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas aereas del EPC, Ri Pyong Chol, comandante de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC, el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres, So Hong Chan, primer viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, y el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres, Pak Jong Chon, subjefe del Estado Mayor General y director del mando de fuego del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al electo presidente rumano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al electo presidente rumano
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Pesidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 20 un mensaje de felicitacion a Klaus Iohannis, recien electo como presidente de Rumania. 
					El remitente desea al destinatario exitos en sus responsabilidades para la prosperidad del pais y el bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Belicistas surcoreanos no deben olvidar leccion de derrota en fuego artillero de isla Yonphyong
articles.content:
Belicistas surcoreanos no deben olvidar leccion de derrota en fuego artillero de isla Yonphyong
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del Ejercito Popular de Corea publico el dia 21 una informacion en relacion con que se tornan cada dia mas graves la naturaleza conflictiva y la locura provocativa de los belicistas del ejercito titere surcoreano aunque transcurrieron 4 anos desde el caso de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong.
					Los belicistas surcoreanos traman intriga para terminar con el frenetico tiro de proyectiles en las islas Paekryong y Yonphyong los ejercicios conjuntos militares Hoguk en contubernio con los yanquis ocupantes del Sur de Corea, comienza la nota y continua:
					
					Ademas, intentan realizar la "ceremonia de recordacion", el "acto de condecoracion" y la "ceremonia de adoracion" para los provocadores muertos con motivo del 23 de noviembre en que ocurrio el caso de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong.
					
					Disfrazan la derrota como "victoria" y actuan descaradamente organizando la "ceremonia de conmemoracion".
					
					Los oficiales y soldados del Frente Sudoeste del EPC observan con alta vigilancia la conducta de los belicistas surcoreanos que llevan al extremo la situacion en la zona maritima muy candente.
					
					Es tan ridiculo el presente comportamiento de quienes suplicaban el cese de fuego luego de ser convertida la isla por el bautismo de justo fuego en un "infierno en que vagabundea la fantasma de muerte" y en "cenizas en que se queman todos".
					
					Sepultar en el mar a los provocadores para que ellos no hablen siquiera de la "recuperacion de la derrota", es la voluntad de represalia de los valientes soldados del Frente Sudoeste del EPC que acogen el 4o aniversario de la victoria en el caso de fuego artillero de la isla Yonphyong.
					
					Morir al fuego terrible del EPC es el inevitable destino tragico de los provocadores.
					
					La detonacion de canones del EPC en el combate de la isla Yonphyong resonara siempre como eco de los triunfadores y para los provocadores como canto funebre.
					
					La informacion concluye advirtiendo a los belicistas militares surcoreanos inolvidar ni un momento la leccion de la derrota amarga sufrida en dicho caso de fuego artillero.

articles.title: CRPP advierte a los titeres surcoreanos que difaman maxima dignidad de RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP advierte a los titeres surcoreanos que difaman maxima dignidad de RPDC
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que llega al extremo la fiebre conflictiva de los titeres surcoreanos que se atreven a insultar la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 21 la siguiente declaracion:
					Por la tarde del dia 20, con motivo del 4o aniversario del incidente de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong, la chusma de las entidades ultraderechistas y conservadoras surcoreanas, incluso la sucursal de la "asociacion de los que cumplen misiones especiales" en Phohang, sostuvieron un mitin anti-RPDC ante la explanada frente al ayuntamiento de Phohang de la provincia de Kyongsang del Norte e insultaron atrevidamente la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC. 
					
					Ese acto descabellado, que coincide con los ejercicios de desembarco conjunto de gran envergadura que tienen lugar en los alrededores de Phohang suponiendo el ataque sorpresivo a la RPDC, es una provocacion politica premeditada por las autoridades surcoreanas. 
					
					La realidad demuestra que la banda de Park Geun-hye preconiza la "confianza", el "dialogo" y la "paz", pero, de hecho, persigue solo el enfrentamiento fratricida y la vana ilusion de lograr la ambicion de "reunificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes".
					
					Ya hemos declarado reiteradamente que no toleraremos jamas y castigaremos tajantemente el insulto sobre la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, considerada por el pueblo coreano como su vida. 
					
					Dado que de esa manera, la camarilla titere surcoreana expuso abiertamente su siniestra intencion de provocar hasta la guerra, elevaremos mas el grado de contraataque y castigaremos despiadadamente a los provocadores con medios y metodos inimaginables. 
					
					La responsabilidad por todas las consecuencias catastroficas, que se produciran en las relaciones intercoreanas, recaera sobre los titeres surcoreanos.
